channel.title: S-Town
channel.description: S-Town is a podcast hosted by Brian Reed from Serial Productions, a New York Times company. The story follows a man named John who despises his Alabama town and decides to do something about it. He asks Brian to investigate the son of a wealthy family who's allegedly been bragging that he got away with murder. But when someone else ends up dead, the search for the truth leads to a nasty feud, a hunt for hidden treasure, and an unearthing of the mysteries of one man's life.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2017 S-Town Podcast and Brian Reed
channel.itunes:summary: S-Town is a podcast hosted by Brian Reed from Serial Productions, a New York Times company. The story follows a man named John who despises his Alabama town and decides to do something about it. He asks Brian to investigate the son of a wealthy family who's allegedly been bragging that he got away with murder. But when someone else ends up dead, the search for the truth leads to a nasty feud, a hunt for hidden treasure, and an unearthing of the mysteries of one man's life.
channel.itunes:author: Serial Productions

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Serial Productions & The New York Times

item.title: The Trojan Horse Affair - Trailer
item.description: A mysterious letter detailing a supposed Islamist plot to take over schools shocked Britain in 2014. But who wrote it? From Serial Productions and The New York Times, “The Trojan Horse Affair,” an investigation that became bigger than we ever imagined. All eight parts are available now, wherever you get your podcasts.
item.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial Productions & The New York Times)

item.title: Chapter I
item.description: “If you keep your mouth shut, you’ll be surprised what you can learn.”
item.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
item.content:encoded: “If you keep your mouth shut, you’ll be surprised what you can learn.”

item.title: Chapter IV
item.description: “If anybody could find it, it would be me.”
item.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
item.content:encoded: “If anybody could find it, it would be me.”

item.title: Chapter V
item.description: “Nobody’ll ever change my mind about it.”

item.title: Chapter VI
item.description: “Since everyone around here thinks I’m a queer anyway.”
item.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
item.content:encoded: “Since everyone around here thinks I’m a queer anyway.”

item.title: Chapter VII
item.description: “You’re beginning to figure it out now, aren’t you?”
